scripts._comment: prettier command ta alada kore chalanor dorkar nai. karon eslint er sathei prettier er plugin setup kora ase. ejonno shudhu lint:fix command ta dilei hobe. tobe jodi eslint-plugin-prettier plugin ta eslint er sathe use kora na hoi taile prettier command ta manually run korte hobe. prettier: prettier --ignore-path .prettierignore --write "**/*.{js,ts,jsx,tsx,json}"
